meanings.definition: Of or relating to a gas at a pressure greater than normal atmospheric pressure.
meanings.sent1: The hyperbaric conditions in the deep sea can affect marine life.
meanings.sent2: The hyperbaric tank was used to study the effects of high pressure on materials.
meanings.sent3: The hyperbaric experiment made the scientists feel like they were in a different world.
meanings.sent4: Her excitement was like a hyperbaric bubble, ready to burst at any moment.
meanings.sent5: The hyperbaric environment felt like being in a tightly squeezed balloon.

meanings.definition: A chamber in which a person is exposed to high atmospheric pressure for medical or therapeutic purposes.
meanings.sent1: The patient underwent treatment in the hyperbaric chamber to heal faster.
meanings.sent2: Doctors recommended using the hyperbaric chamber for oxygen therapy.
meanings.sent3: The hyperbaric chamber looked like a futuristic pod straight out of a sci-fi movie.
meanings.sent4: In the hyperbaric chamber, time seemed to slow down, creating a surreal experience.
meanings.sent5: The hissing sound of the hyperbaric chamber filled the room with anticipation.
